lines.i: This section lists and describes all relevant clinical problems at the time the document is generated. At a minimum, all pertinent current and historical problems should be listed.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9179 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5.1"
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:9183)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Concern Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15409)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15410)
SHALL conform to Problem Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15409)/@code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15410)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry (CONF:7882)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Concern Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:9183)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Concern Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.3)
